# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*.so
*.pyd
*.pyo

# Virtual environments
.env
.venv
env/
venv/
ENV/

# Logs
*.log

# OS files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Python environment files
*.egg-info/
.eggs/
pip-log.txt
pip-delete-this-directory.txt

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp

# FAISS index and vector store files
*.faiss
*.pkl
*.pkl.gz
index_store/
faiss_index/

# Huggingface/transformers cache
~/.cache/
~/.huggingface/
~/.local/share/huggingface/
huggingface/

# FastAPI auto-generated files
*.db
*.sqlite3

# Test artifacts
.coverage
htmlcov/
.tox/
.pytest_cache/
nosetests.xml
coverage.xml
*.cover

# Uvicorn reload artifacts
*.pid
